description: Proposed single storey rear / side extension.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.	Reason:  As required  by Section 91 of  the Town  and Country Planning  Act  1990,  as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
Conditions 9 and 10 (Construction Management Plan) - The RBK Highways Engineer has reviewed the information provided and is satisfied that these conditions can now be approved.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that Conditions 9 and 10 (Construction Management Plan) of planning permmission 18/14233/FUL are hereby fully approved.

Please provide a copy of block plan scaled 1:500 showing the proposed works (hatched or shaded) in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site.  The block plan should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.The submitted block plan does not show the proposed extension.
